name: Danny's House
description:
You have been invited over by your neighbor to watch her new dog Ginger during a thunderstorm, however after hearing of an escaped serial killer in your area you must keep yourself and the dog safe during a home invasion. 

In this short horror experience you will find:

satisfying cleaning mechanics.

a story driven gameplay loop.

survival horror mechanics.

Danny.

This is my second 3D horror game and it should take about 20 minutes to complete.
